actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude certain mission societies and their missionary members from social security taxes.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code and the Social Security Act to exclude certain mission societies and their missionary members from social security taxes.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude certain mission societies and their missionary members from social security taxes.
